title: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in the data source. Currently, on the iSeries platform using the JTOpen JDBC drivers, the tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system, which includes several hundred tables. Even with the schema filter implemented, a warning message is still displayed on load as the tree is being populated.
OB: On the iSeries platform using the JTOpen JDBC drivers, the tree control shows every schema (aka catalog) on the system. This is easily several hundred tables. Using the code from the CVS repository dated 6/30/05, the schema filter is implemented but the warning message is still displayed on load since the tree is being populated on load.
